name: mm::tlb::TlbFlushOp::perform_on_current

arch::mm::tlb_flush_all_excluding_global.doc: Flush all TLB entries except for the global-page entries.

core::panicking::panic.doc: The underlying implementation of core's `panic!` macro when no formatting is used.

arch::mm::tlb_flush_addr.doc:
Flush any TLB entry that contains the map of the given virtual address.

 This flush performs regardless of the global-page bit. So it can flush both global
 and non-global entries.

arch::mm::tlb_flush_addr_range.doc: Flush any TLB entry that intersects with the given address range.

doc: Performs the TLB flush operation on the current CPU.
